resources.string: I-Mzansi Lingo yinkqubo yokufunda ulwimi esebenza ngeselula, edidiyelelayo ezisa uvuyo lokufunda kwilifa lethu lemveli nolwimi eMzantsi Afrika. Sinikezela ngeekosi kwiilwimi ezisixhenxe ezisemthethweni zaseMzantsi Afrika: isiZulu, isiXhosa, Sesotho, Setswana, Sepedi, Afrikaans, neNgesi.

I-app yethu idibanisa ukufunda okunemdlalo, ukuzidibanisa nenkcubeko, kunye nokuzilolonga ukuthetha okusebenzayo ukunceda abasebenzisi ukuba baphumelele kwisigama, kwigrama, nakwizakhono zencoko. Yenzelwe abemi baseMzantsi Afrika nabatyeleli, sikhuthaza ukuthetha iilwimi ezininzi nonxibelelwano phakathi kweenkcubeko kuwo wonke uMzantsi Afrika.

Abaphulaphuli bethu abaphambili baquka abemi baseMzantsi Afrika, abakhenkethi, abaphuma ngaphandle, kunye nabafundi abanonmdla wokufunda iilwimi zalapha ukuze baphuhlise inkcubeko, ukukhula ngokwengqesho, okanye ubudlelane bobuqu. Samkela nabani na onentshisekelo kwiilwimi nenkcubeko yaseMzantsi Afrika.

üéÆ Ukufunda Okusekwe Kumdlalo: Amabhaso amnandi njengamanqaku, iibheji, kunye nemigca yempumelelo yenza ukufunda kube mnandi kwaye kukhuthaze ngendlela entle.

üèÜ Iibhodi Zabaholi & Ukubekwa Ngokwamabanga: Thelekisa inkqubela yakho nabahlobo kunye nabanye abafundi ukukhuthaza kunye nomoya woluntu.

üìÖ Iinjongo Zemihla Ngemihla & Izikhumbuzo: Misela iinjongo zemihla ngemihla kwaye ufumane izikhumbuzo ukwakha imikhwa yokufunda eqhubekayo nangona uneshedyuli exakekileyo.

üìö Igrama & Amanqanaba Obuchwepheshe: Izifundo ziqhubela phambili ukusuka kwiqala ukuya kweziphezulu ngamanyathelo acacileyo, zakha ukuzithemba kwaye zenze inkqubela ilula ukulandelela.

üó£Ô∏è Ukufunda Okugxile Ekuthetheni: Imisebenzi yokuthetha, ukujonga ukuphimisela, kunye neencoko ze-AI ziphucula ukuzithemba ekuthetheni kwixesha lokwenyani, kungekhona nje isigama.

üåç Ukudityaniswa Kwenkcubeko: Funda iilwimi kumxholo wazo wenkcubeko ukuze ufumane ukuqonda okunzulu kunye nokuqonda.

Ubabaxanwa wethu obuhlobo wopopayi oluluhlaza umele umoya woMzantsi Afrika. Ngamehlo amakhulu angqukuva, uncumo olonwabileyo, kunye neempondo ezimhlophe, i-mascot yethu yobabaxanwa ibonisa ubuhlobo kunye nendalo emnandi yokufunda ulwimi ngelixa idibanisa nesazisi saseMzantsi Afrika.

Sibona uMzantsi Afrika apho imiqobo yolwimi ingamabhulorho okuqonda, apho lonke isakhamuzi linokuncokola ngaphesheya kwemida yenkcubeko, kwaye apho ukwahluka kwethu ngolwimi kube ngamandla ethu amakhulu. Ngobugcisa kunye nophuhliso, senza ukufunda ulwimi kufumaneke kubo bonke abantu.

Iphuhlisiwe nge-‚ù§Ô∏è yoMzantsi Afrika

I-imeyile: mzansilingo@gmail.com

Enkosi ekhethekileyo kuluntu lweelwimi olugcina kwaye lwabelana ngeelwimi ezintle zaseMzantsi Afrika.

Ukuhamba & Iimfuno Zemihla Ngemihla/\nReis & Daaglikse Behoeftes
Akukho app ifumanekayo yokuvula iifayile ze-PDF
Akukho ziphumo zovavanyo ezifunyenweyo kumsebenzisi wangoku
Kulayishwe iziphumo zovavanyo ezingu-%d kumsebenzisi wangoku

Ngaba usandula ufika kwi-app yethu yokufunda ulwimi? Qalisa ngokwenza iprofayile yakho, ukhethe ulwimi lwakho olujoliswe kulo, kwaye uthabathe uvavanyo lokubekwa ukumisela inqanaba lakho langoku. Inkqubo yethu yokufunda eguquguqukayo iya kwenza indlela yokufunda elalelwe wena wedwa.

Ungahlaziya ulwazi lweprofayile yakho, utshintshe iphasiwedi yakho, kwaye ulawule umrhumo wakho kwi-menyu ye-Zisetingi. Ukuze uphinde usete iphasiwedi yakho, cofa \'Ulibele iPhasiwedi\' kwisikrini sokungena kwaye ulandele imiyalelo ethunyelwe kwi-imeyile yakho.

I-app yethu ibonelela ngezifundo ezidibaniselayo, ukuziqhelanisa nesigama, uqeqesho lokuphimisela, kunye nokuziqonda kwenkcubeko. Sebenzisa imiceli-mngeni yemihla ngemihla ukugcina umzila wakho, kwaye ungalibali ukuphonononga izinto ofunde ngaphambili ukuze womeleze ukugcinwa kwememori yakho.

Ukuba unengxaki yokuwisa, iingxaki zokulayisha, okanye iingxaki zomsindo, zama ukuqalisa kwakhona i-app, khangela unxibelelwano lwakho lwe-intanethi, kwaye uqinisekise ukuba unayo eyona nguqulelo yakutshanje ifakiwe. Susa i-cache ye-app ukuba iingxaki ziqhubeka.

Lawula umrhumo wakho nge-app store yesixhobo sakho (iGoogle Play Store okanye i-Apple App Store). Unganyusa, wehle, okanye urhoxise umrhumo wakho nanini na. Imigaqo-nkqubo yokubuya imali ilawulwa yimigaqo ye-app store ekhoyo.

Landela uhambo lwakho lokufunda nge-tab ye-Inkqubela. Jonga umgca wakho wemihla ngemihla, izifundo ezigqityiweyo, amagama aphumeliweyo, kunye nenqanaba lobugcisa ngokubanzi. Misela iinjongo zemihla ngemihla kwaye ufumane izaziso ukuze uhlale ukhuthazekile kwaye uqhubekekile nokufunda kwakho.

Khuphela izifundo ukuze uzisebenzise ngaphandle kwe-intanethi xa unoxhumano oluqinisekileyo lwe-intanethi. Izifundo ezingaphandle kwe-intanethi ziquka imisebenzi esekwe kumbhalo kunye nomsindo olayishwe kwangaphambili. Inkqubela yakho iya kudityaniswa ngokuzenzekelayo xa uphinda uqhagamshele kwi-intanethi.

U: Ndingafunda iilwimi ezininzi?
I: Ewe! Ungongeza iilwimi ezininzi kwiprofayile yakho kwaye utshintshe phakathi kwazo.

U: Zide kangakanani izifundo?
I: Izifundo zisukela kwimizuzu emi-5 ukuya kweli-15, ilungele ukuziqhelanisa kwemihla ngemihla.

U: Ndingayisebenzisa i-app ngaphandle kwe-intanethi?
I: Ewe, ngomxholo okhutshelwe ngaphandle kwe-intanethi.

Usadinga uncedo? Iqela lethu lenkxaso likulungele ukukunceda:

I-imeyile: mzansilingo@gmail.com
Imnxeba: 1234567890
Idilesi: 123 Smith Street

Ixesha lokuphendula: Kwiiyure ezingama-24
Iiyure zenkxaso: UMvulo - Lwesihlanu, 9 AM - 6 PM

Nceda uqale ngokungena nge-imeyile/iphasiwedi okanye iGoogle ukuseta uqinisekiso lwe-biometric
Iphasiwedi kufuneka ibe nobuncinane boonobumba abayi-6
Iinzame ezininzi ezingaphumelelanga. Nceda uzame kwakhona kamva.
Impazamo yenethiwekhi. Nceda ukhangele unxibelelwano lwakho.
I-imeyile sele ibhalisiwe. Zama ukungena endaweni yoko.
Imvume ye-alam echanekileyo iyafuneka ukuze izaziso zisebenze ngokufanelekileyo
Nceda uvumele imvume ye-alam echanekileyo kwiisetingi
Vavanya ulwazi lwakho ngemibuzo eli-10 enokukhetha. Akukho intanethi iyafuneka!
Vavanya ulwazi lwakho ngemibuzo eli-10 enokukhetha. Akukho intanethi iyafuneka!

Siqokelela ulwazi olusinika lona ngqo, njengokuba xa usenza i-akhawunti, usebenzisa iimpawu zethu zokufunda ulwimi, okanye usiqhagamshelela ukufumana inkxaso. Oku kunokubandakanya igama lakho, idilesi ye-imeyile, inkqubela yokufunda, kunye nezinto ozikhethayo.

Sisebenzisa ulwazi esiluqokelelayo ukubonelela, ukugcina, kwaye siphuhlise iinkonzo zethu zokufunda ulwimi, silandele inkqubela yakho yokufunda, senze amava akho abe ngawakho, kwaye sinxibelelane nawe malunga ne-akhawunti yakho kunye neenkonzo zethu.

Siphumeza amanyathelo okhuseleko afanelekileyo ukukhusela ulwazi lwakho lobuqu ngokuchasene nokungena okungagunyaziwe, utshintsho, ukubhengezwa, okanye ukonakaliswa. Idatha yakho iyafihlelwa zombini ekuhambeni nakwikho-lokho kusetyenziswa iiprothokholi ezisemgangathweni wemizi-mveliso.

Asithengisi, sitshintshiselane, okanye sidlulisele ulwazi lwakho lobuqu kubathathu-nxanye ngaphandle kwemvume yakho, ngaphandle njengoko kuchaziwe kulo mgaqo-nkqubo. Singalwabelana ngolwazi ngababoneleli beenkonzo abasincedayo ekusebenziseni i-app yethu nasekuboneleleni ngeenkonzo kuwe.

Sigcina ulwazi lwakho ixesha elifunekayo ukukunikezela ngeenkonzo zethu kwaye njengoko kuchaziwe kulo mgaqo-nkqubo. Ungacela ukucinywa kwe-akhawunti yakho kunye nedatha edibeneyo nangaliphi na ixesha ngokuqhagamshelana nathi.

Unelungelo lokufikelela, ukuhlaziya, okanye ukucima ulwazi lwakho lobuqu. Unokukhetha ukungathumeli ezinye zonxibelelwano ezivela kuthi. Ukuba unayo nayiphi na imibuzo malunga namalungelo akho obumfihlo, nceda usiqhagamshelele.

Inkonzo yethu ayijongelwanga abantwana abangaphantsi kweminyaka eli-13. Asiqokeleli ulwazi lobuqu kubantwana abangaphantsi kweminyaka eli-13 ngokwazi. Ukuba sazi ukuba siqokelele ulwazi lobuqu kumntwana ongaphantsi kweminyaka eli-13, siya kuthatha amanyathelo okususa olo lwazi.

Singaluhlaziya olu mgaqo-nkqubo wobumfihlo ngamaxesha athile. Siya kukwazisa ngayo nayiphi na inguqu ngokuthumela umgaqo-nkqubo omtsha kule phepha kwaye sihlaziye umhla \'Wokugqibela wahlaziywa\'. Ukuqhubeka kwakho usebenzisa inkonzo yethu emva kwayo nayiphi na inguqu kuthetha ukwamkela umgaqo-nkqubo omtsha.

Ukuba unayo nayiphi na imibuzo malunga nalo Mgaqo-nkqubo Wobumfihlo okanye iinkqubo zethu, nceda usiqhagamshelele:

I-imeyile: mzansilingo@gmail.com
Imnxeba: 1234567890
Idilesi: 123 Smith Street
Impazamo ekuhlaziyeni i-imeyile: %s. Kunokufuneka uphinde uqinisekise.
